title: Isle Royale National Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 16, 2016  Centennial Celebrations at  Isle Royale National Park  Throughout the month of August, Isle Royale National Park will celebrate the National Park Service’s (NPS) 100 birthday. Events will take place in Rock Harbor, Windigo, and Houghton. On August 25   July 13, 2016  Join an Isle Royale Park Ranger for Stories and Programs at Keweenaw Libraries  Throughout the summer, join a park ranger for stories and programs focused on the wonders and wildlife of Isle Royale. Programs range from 30 to 60 minutes for families and kids.   June 29, 2016  Keweenaw Waterway Cruises Aboard the Ranger III  Join Isle Royale National Park aboard the Ranger III for summer 2016 Keweenaw Waterway Cruises.   June 21, 2016  Helicopter “Heavy Lift” Project at Isle Royale  What do you do when you have 64 tons of bridging planks and logs to move into remote trail locations in an isolated National Park? In the case of Isle Royale, you convene interagency expertise and regional crews to support a helicopter operation; Project Heavy Lift.   April 18, 2016  Isle Royale National Park and Michigan Tech University Announce Wolf-Moose Project Winter Study Findings  2016 Wolf-Moose Project Winter Study findings.
